title: Is Alcohol More Harmful to the Brain at 3 Stages of Life?
subtitle: During these three key periods, the brain undergoes dynamic changes, which could make the cognitive organ more sensitive to the neurotoxic effects of alcohol.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: According to a scientific review published in December 2020, researchers found alcohol may be most harmful to the human brain at three ages: fetal development, the mid-to-late teenage years, and lastly in populations 65 and older.
